EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Building Microservices with ASP.NET Core
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Building Microservices with ASP.NET Core eBook. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
